      • getPreUpgradeScriptName

        public String getPreUpgradeScriptName(int index,
                                      String upgradeScriptName)
        Description copied from interface: IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Get the pre-upgrade script for a given script name. Schema tool runs the pre-upgrade scripts returned by this method before running any upgrade scripts. These scripts could contain setup statements may fail on some database versions and failure is ignorable.
        Specified by:
        getPreUpgradeScriptName in interface IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Parameters:
        index - - index number of the file. The preupgrade script name is derived using the given index
        upgradeScriptName - - upgrade script name
        Returns:
        name of the pre-upgrade script to be run before running upgrade script

      • getHiveSchemaVersion

        public String getHiveSchemaVersion()
        Description copied from interface: IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Get hive distribution schema version. Schematool uses this version to identify the Hive version. It compares this version with the version found in metastore database to determine the upgrade or initialization scripts
        Specified by:
        getHiveSchemaVersion in interface IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Returns:
        Hive schema version

      • isVersionCompatible

        public boolean isVersionCompatible(String hiveVersion,
                                   String dbVersion)
        Description copied from interface: IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        A dbVersion is compatible with hive version if it is greater or equal to the hive version. This is result of the db schema upgrade design principles followed in hive project. The state where db schema version is ahead of hive software version is often seen when a 'rolling upgrade' or 'rolling downgrade' is happening. This is a state where hive is functional and returning non zero status for it is misleading.
        Specified by:
        isVersionCompatible in interface IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Parameters:
        hiveVersion - version of hive software
        dbVersion - version of metastore rdbms schema
        Returns:
        true if versions are compatible

      • getMetaStoreSchemaVersion

        public String getMetaStoreSchemaVersion(HiveSchemaHelper.MetaStoreConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
                                 throws HiveMetaException
        Description copied from interface: IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Get the schema version from the backend database. This version is used by SchemaTool to to compare the version returned by getHiveSchemaVersion and determine the upgrade order and scripts needed to upgrade the metastore schema
        Specified by:
        getMetaStoreSchemaVersion in interface IMetaStoreSchemaInfo
        Parameters:
        connectionInfo - Connection information needed to connect to the backend database
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HiveMetaException - when unable to fetch the schema version
